Package terminals

Class RentingTerminalMethods

java.lang.Object
terminals.RentingTerminalMethods
public class RentingTerminalMethods extends Object
This terminal (representing the app) allows to - interact with the user to rent and return a bike - prevent a user from renting more than one bike at a time - create an ongoing trip added to the list ongoing_trips - register when a bike is parked in a docking station - register when a bike is let on the streets - add the trip to the log of finished trips (balances are updated automatically thanks to observer pattern)

      public static boolean renting_allowed(Users user_logged)
      It allows the user to rent at most one bike.
      Parameters:
      user_logged - the user
      Returns:
      the boolean indicating if the user can rent a bike

    • renting

      public static Bicycles renting(Users user_logged)
      This part corresponds to the renting interaction for the user. The user has to choose an existing bike in order to rent it.
      Parameters:
      user_logged - the user
      Returns:
      the bicycle that has been rent

    • returning

      public static void returning(Users user_logged, Bicycles bike_taken, int time)
      This part corresponds to the returning interaction for the user. The user has to park the bike before claiming that the trip is over.
      Parameters:
      user_logged - the user
      bike_taken - the returned bike
      time - the duration of the trip

    • Terminal

      public static void Terminal(Coordinates start_coor, Coordinates end_coor, int time)
      This method simulates the global interaction between the user and the terminal/
      Parameters:
      start_coor - the starting coordinates of the trip
      end_coor - the ending coordinates of the trip
      time - the duration of the trip
